## rds-card-media Readme

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


### Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                          | Type                           | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------------------ | ------------------------------ | ----------- |
| `size`   | `size`    | Set the height of the media element. | `"lg" , "md" , "sm" , "xs"` | `'md'`      |
| `src`    | `src`     | Set the source url of the image.     | `string`                       | `undefined` |
| `tag`    | `tag`     | Set the tag text of the image.       | `string`                       | `undefined` |
